channel.title: Adventure Spain Featured on The Ulampinoy Project

item.title: Jamón Tumaca
item.description: Typical Spaniard breakfast of toasted bread with jamón, tomato(finely chopped or grated) and extra-virgin olive oil. Pan tostada con tomate Upscale it by adding a top layer of cured Spanish ham. When I said Spanish ham, I mean this: Charcutería, the one stop shop for everything pork goodness. All made possible with Spain’s super dry low air humidity.
